name: TimeToMove
description:
It's time to put your dancing skills to the test. It's Time... To Move. 

Features:

 - Multiple dances to select from, from the easiest to the hardest.

 - Tracks and scores your moves with just a camera - no specialized hardware required.

 - Involving gameplay - keep up with the dance to stay in the game. 

Because the game is still in early access, some features will be added later: 

- Local and networked multiplayer. 

- Support for custom dances. 

- General improvements.
